channel.title: CVE Feed for Mozilla -- Network Security Services (NSS)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mozilla -- Network Security Services (NSS)

item.title: CVE-2018-12404|2024-08-05T08:38:05.124Z -- mozilla -- network%20security%20services%20%28nss%29
item.description: A cached side channel attack during handshakes using RSA encryption could allow for the decryption of encrypted content. This is a variant of the Adaptive Chosen Ciphertext attack (AKA Bleichenbacher attack) and affects all NSS versions prior to NSS 3.41.
